title: 'The Late, Great Hannibal Lecter'
summary: Trump repeatedly praised Hannibal Lecter - the fictional cannibal serial killer from 'Silence of the Lambs' - calling him 'a wonderful man' and 'the late, great Hannibal Lecter' at rallies.
